  • Method Details

    • rewrite

      public boolean rewrite​(org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor mv, int opcode)
      Replaces outer class member access from an inner class. This method is called while visiting a method inside of an inner class in order to replace access to members of outer class with a call to a dynamically generated static package-level method.
      Parameters:
      mv - method visitor
      opcode - visitMethodInsn opcode argument.
      Returns:
      true if the rewrite is succeeded false otherwise.

    • rewrite

      public boolean rewrite​(org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor cv)
      Generates static package-level method into a outer class. This method is called while visiting an outer class.
      Parameters:
      cv - class visitor
      Returns:
      true if the rewrite is succeeded false otherwise.
